channel.title: Where Is Lucas
channel.description: Recent content on Where Is Lucas

item.title: Blender 2020 - Week 3 - Back from mission
item.description: This week I wanted to create a sci-fi interior, so I created this corridor with Blender. I felt like the composition lacked of a main subject, so I modeled the astronaut afterwards, looking into space, hlding his helmet. Everythinh is made with Blender. The corridor is made using hard-surface modeling techniques and the astronaut is sculpted. This is rendered with eevee in Blender 2.8. I'll be happy to share the project files if asked!

item.title: Blender 2020 - Week 2 - Hyper Drive
item.description: Second week of creation with Blender. I think January will be around spaceships! I wanted to showcase the little spaceship I made for the previous art. I animated it and created this hyperdrive effect with particles system and motion blur. This is rendered with eevee in Blender 2.8. I'll be happy to share the project files if asked!

item.title: Blender 2020 - Week 1 - Escaping
item.description: I'll try to post 3D art every week here. This is the first creation I made this year with Blender. The main object with this project was to mess around with volumetrics lighting. This is rendered with eevee in Blender 2.8. I'll be happy to share the project files if asked!

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! My name is Lucas Houssa and I'm a curious guy from Belgium. I'm a physics student at University of Li√®ge, and besides this, I do a lot of things. I'm a webdev and sound engineer and I co-created RETINENS, a collective composed of creators and technicians of the audio-visual domain. I mainly work with Laravel for the webdev part, and my focus is on the backend. I'm also a 3D enthusiast that loves to mess around with Blender in my freetime.
